author: Ms Warangkana "Bua" Dejsupa
description: Yellow with a tinge to green but herbal non-the-less with coffee and chocolate.
name: Green Day In Bangkok

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger ale and soda

Alternatively, rather than the trio of sugar syrups, the original recipe calls for 15ml of Green syrup made by simmering mint, ginger and lemongrass in water, then straining out the herbs and adding equal parts sugar
